SEARCH
Package org.apache.calcite.rel.rules

Class CoreRules

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.rel.rules.CoreRules
public class CoreRules extends Object
Rules that perform logical transformations on relational expressions.
See Also:
  • MaterializedViewRules

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final AggregateProjectPullUpConstantsRule
    AGGREGATE_ANY_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
    More general form of AGGREGATE_PROJECT_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS that matches any relational expression.
    static final AggregateCaseToFilterRule
    AGGREGATE_CASE_TO_FILTER
    Rule that converts CASE-style filtered aggregates into true filtered aggregates.
    static final AggregateExpandDistinctAggregatesRule
    AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES
    Rule that expands distinct aggregates (such as COUNT(DISTINCT x)) from a Aggregate.
    static final AggregateExpandDistinctAggregatesRule
    AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES_TO_JOIN
    As AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES but generates a Join.
    static final AggregateExpandWithinDistinctRule
    AGGREGATE_EXPAND_WITHIN_DISTINCT
    Rule that rewrites a LogicalAggregate that contains WITHIN DISTINCT aggregate functions to one that does not.
    static final AggregateFilterTransposeRule
    AGGREGATE_FILTER_TRANSPOSE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Filter and transposes them, pushing the aggregate below the filter.
    static final AggregateJoinJoinRemoveRule
    AGGREGATE_JOIN_JOIN_REMOVE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Join and removes the left input of the join provided that the left input is also a left join if possible.
    static final AggregateJoinRemoveRule
    AGGREGATE_JOIN_REMOVE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Join and removes the join provided that the join is a left join or right join and it computes no aggregate functions or all the aggregate calls have distinct.
    static final AggregateJoinTransposeRule
    AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
    Rule that pushes an Aggregate past a Join.
    static final AggregateJoinTransposeRule
    AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE_EXTENDED
    As AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE, but extended to push down aggregate functions.
    static final AggregateMergeRule
    AGGREGATE_MERGE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate on an Aggregate, and merges into a single Aggregate if the top aggregate's group key is a subset of the lower aggregate's group key, and the aggregates are expansions of rollups.
    static final AggregateMinMaxToLimitRule
    AGGREGATE_MIN_MAX_TO_LIMIT
    Rule that transforms an MIN/MAX Aggregate functions into equivalent subqueries with ORDER BY and LIMIT 1.
    static final AggregateProjectMergeRule
    AGGREGATE_PROJECT_MERGE
    Rule that recognizes an Aggregate on top of a Project and if possible aggregates through the Project or removes the Project.
    static final AggregateProjectPullUpConstantsRule
    AGGREGATE_PROJECT_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
    Rule that removes constant keys from an Aggregate.
    static final AggregateProjectStarTableRule
    AGGREGATE_PROJECT_STAR_TABLE
    Variant of AGGREGATE_STAR_TABLE that accepts a Project between the Aggregate and its StarTable.StarTableScan input.
    static final AggregateReduceFunctionsRule
    AGGREGATE_REDUCE_FUNCTIONS
    Rule that reduces aggregate functions in an Aggregate to simpler forms.
    static final AggregateRemoveRule
    AGGREGATE_REMOVE
    Rule that removes an Aggregate if it computes no aggregate functions (that is, it is implementing SELECT DISTINCT), or all the aggregate functions are splittable, and the underlying relational expression is already distinct.
    static final AggregateStarTableRule
    AGGREGATE_STAR_TABLE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate on a StarTable.StarTableScan.
    static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule
    AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE
    Rule that matches an Aggregate whose input is a Union one of whose inputs is an Aggregate.
    static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule
    AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_FIRST
    As AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE, but matches an Aggregate only as the left input of the Union.
    static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule
    AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_SECOND
    As AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE, but matches an Aggregate only as the right input of the Union.
    static final AggregateUnionTransposeRule
    AGGREGATE_UNION_TRANSPOSE
    Rule that pushes an Aggregate past a non-distinct Union.
    static final AggregateValuesRule
    AGGREGATE_VALUES
    Rule that applies an Aggregate to a Values (currently just an empty Values).
    static final CalcMergeRule
    CALC_MERGE
    Rule that merges a Calc onto a Calc.
    static final ReduceDecimalsRule
    CALC_REDUCE_DECIMALS
    Rule that reduces operations on the DECIMAL type, such as casts or arithmetic, into operations involving more primitive types such as BIGINT and DOUBLE.

    CALC_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS

    PROJECT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE

    SORT_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS

    SORT_REMOVE_REDUNDANT
    Rule that removes redundant Order By or Limit when its input RelNode's max row count is less than or equal to specified row count.All of them are represented by Sort

    UNION_MERGE

    UNION_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
    Rule that pulls up constants through a Union operator.
    static final UnionEliminatorRule
    UNION_REMOVE
    Rule that removes a Union if it has only one input.
    static final UnionToDistinctRule
    UNION_TO_DISTINCT
    Rule that translates a distinct Union (all = false) into an Aggregate on top of a non-distinct Union (all = true).
    static final UnionToValuesRule
    UNION_TO_VALUES
    Rule that translates a Union to Values if it's all input are Values.
    static final ReduceExpressionsRule.WindowReduceExpressionsRule
    WINDOW_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
    Rule that reduces constants inside a LogicalWindow.

      Rule that matches an Aggregate on an Aggregate, and merges into a single Aggregate if the top aggregate's group key is a subset of the lower aggregate's group key, and the aggregates are expansions of rollups.

      public static final AggregateRemoveRule AGGREGATE_REMOVE

      public static final AggregateMinMaxToLimitRule AGGREGATE_MIN_MAX_TO_LIMIT
      Rule that transforms an MIN/MAX Aggregate functions into equivalent subqueries with ORDER BY and LIMIT 1.

    • AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES

      public static final AggregateExpandDistinctAggregatesRule AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES
      Rule that expands distinct aggregates (such as COUNT(DISTINCT x)) from a Aggregate. This instance operates only on logical expressions.

    • AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES_TO_JOIN

      public static final AggregateExpandDistinctAggregatesRule AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES_TO_JOIN
      As AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES but generates a Join.

    • AGGREGATE_EXPAND_WITHIN_DISTINCT

      public static final AggregateExpandWithinDistinctRule AGGREGATE_EXPAND_WITHIN_DISTINCT
      Rule that rewrites a LogicalAggregate that contains WITHIN DISTINCT aggregate functions to one that does not.

    • AGGREGATE_FILTER_TRANSPOSE

      public static final AggregateFilterTransposeRule AGGREGATE_FILTER_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Filter and transposes them, pushing the aggregate below the filter.

    • AGGREGATE_JOIN_JOIN_REMOVE

      public static final AggregateJoinJoinRemoveRule AGGREGATE_JOIN_JOIN_REMOVE
      Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Join and removes the left input of the join provided that the left input is also a left join if possible.

    • AGGREGATE_JOIN_REMOVE

      public static final AggregateJoinRemoveRule AGGREGATE_JOIN_REMOVE
      Rule that matches an Aggregate on a Join and removes the join provided that the join is a left join or right join and it computes no aggregate functions or all the aggregate calls have distinct.

    • AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE

      public static final AggregateJoinTransposeRule AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes an Aggregate past a Join.

    • AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE_EXTENDED

      public static final AggregateJoinTransposeRule AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE_EXTENDED
      As AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE, but extended to push down aggregate functions.

    • AGGREGATE_UNION_TRANSPOSE

      public static final AggregateUnionTransposeRule AGGREGATE_UNION_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes an Aggregate past a non-distinct Union.

    • AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE

      public static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE
      Rule that matches an Aggregate whose input is a Union one of whose inputs is an Aggregate.

      Because it matches RelNode for each input of Union, it will create O(N ^ 2) matches, which may cost too much during the popMatch phase in VolcanoPlanner. If efficiency is a concern, we recommend that you use AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_FIRST and AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_SECOND instead.

    • AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_FIRST

      public static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_FIRST
      As AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE, but matches an Aggregate only as the left input of the Union.

    • AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_SECOND

      public static final AggregateUnionAggregateRule AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_SECOND
      As AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE, but matches an Aggregate only as the right input of the Union.

    • AGGREGATE_CASE_TO_FILTER

      public static final AggregateCaseToFilterRule AGGREGATE_CASE_TO_FILTER
      Rule that converts CASE-style filtered aggregates into true filtered aggregates.

    • CALC_MERGE

      public static final CalcMergeRule CALC_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Calc onto a Calc.

    • CALC_REMOVE

      public static final CalcRemoveRule CALC_REMOVE
      Rule that removes a trivial LogicalCalc.

    • CALC_REDUCE_DECIMALS

      public static final ReduceDecimalsRule CALC_REDUCE_DECIMALS
      Rule that reduces operations on the DECIMAL type, such as casts or arithmetic, into operations involving more primitive types such as BIGINT and DOUBLE.

    • CALC_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS

      public static final ReduceExpressionsRule.CalcReduceExpressionsRule CALC_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
      Rule that reduces constants inside a LogicalCalc.
      See Also:
      • FILTER_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS

    • CALC_SPLIT

      public static final CalcSplitRule CALC_SPLIT
      Rule that converts a Calc to a Project and Filter.

    • CALC_TO_WINDOW

      public static final ProjectToWindowRule.CalcToWindowRule CALC_TO_WINDOW
      Rule that transforms a Calc that contains windowed aggregates to a mixture of LogicalWindow and Calc.

    • COERCE_INPUTS

      public static final CoerceInputsRule COERCE_INPUTS
      Rule that pre-casts inputs to a particular type. This can assist operator implementations that impose requirements on their input types.

    • EXCHANGE_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS

      public static final ExchangeRemoveConstantKeysRule EXCHANGE_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS
      Rule that removes constants inside a LogicalExchange.

    • SORT_EXCHANGE_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS

      Rule that removes constants inside a LogicalSortExchange.

    • FILTER_INTO_JOIN

      public static final FilterJoinRule.FilterIntoJoinRule FILTER_INTO_JOIN
      Rule that tries to push filter expressions into a join condition and into the inputs of the join.

    • FILTER_INTO_JOIN_DUMB

      public static final FilterJoinRule.FilterIntoJoinRule FILTER_INTO_JOIN_DUMB
      Dumber version of FILTER_INTO_JOIN. Not intended for production use, but keeps some tests working for which FILTER_INTO_JOIN is too smart.

    • FILTER_MERGE

      public static final FilterMergeRule FILTER_MERGE
      Rule that combines two LogicalFilters.

    • FILTER_CALC_MERGE

      public static final FilterCalcMergeRule FILTER_CALC_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Filter and a LogicalCalc. The result is a LogicalCalc whose filter condition is the logical AND of the two.
      See Also:
      • PROJECT_CALC_MERGE

      • AGGREGATE_FILTER_TRANSPOSE

    • FILTER_PROJECT_TRANSPOSE

      public static final FilterProjectTransposeRule FILTER_PROJECT_TRANSPOSE
      The default instance of FilterProjectTransposeRule.

      It does not allow a Filter to be pushed past the Project if there is a correlation condition anywhere in the Filter, since in some cases it can prevent a Correlate from being de-correlated.

    • FILTER_SAMPLE_TRANSPOSE

      public static final FilterSampleTransposeRule FILTER_SAMPLE_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes a Filter past a Sample.

      Rule that pushes a Filter past a TableFunctionScan.

    • FILTER_INTERPRETER_SCAN

    • FILTER_CORRELATE

      public static final ProjectJoinRemoveRule PROJECT_JOIN_REMOVE
      Rule that matches an Project on a Join and removes the join provided that the join is a left join or right join and the join keys are unique.

    • PROJECT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE

      public static final ProjectJoinTransposeRule PROJECT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes a LogicalProject past a LogicalJoin by splitting the projection into a projection on top of each child of the join.

    • PROJECT_MERGE

      public static final ProjectMergeRule PROJECT_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Project into another Project, provided the projects are not projecting identical sets of input references.

    • PROJECT_SET_OP_TRANSPOSE

      public static final ProjectSetOpTransposeRule PROJECT_SET_OP_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes a LogicalProject past a SetOp.

      The children of the SetOp will project only the RexInputRefs referenced in the original LogicalProject.

      Rule that permutes the inputs to an inner Join.

    • SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE

      public static final SortUnionTransposeRule SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE
      Rule that pushes a Sort past a Union.

      This rule instance is for a Union implementation that does not preserve the ordering of its inputs. Thus, it makes no sense to match this rule if the Sort does not have a limit, i.e., Sort.fetch is null.

      See Also:
      • SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE_MATCH_NULL_FETCH

    • SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE_MATCH_NULL_FETCH

      public static final SortUnionTransposeRule SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE_MATCH_NULL_FETCH
      As SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE, but for a Union implementation that preserves the ordering of its inputs. It is still worth applying this rule even if the Sort does not have a limit, for the merge of already sorted inputs that the Union can do is usually cheap.

    • SORT_JOIN_COPY

      public static final SortJoinCopyRule SORT_JOIN_COPY
      Rule that copies a Sort past a Join without its limit and offset. The original Sort is preserved but can potentially be removed by SORT_REMOVE if redundant.

    • SORT_REMOVE

      public static final SortRemoveRule SORT_REMOVE
      Rule that removes a Sort if its input is already sorted.

    • LIMIT_MERGE

      public static final SortMergeRule LIMIT_MERGE
      Rule that merge a Sort representing the Limit semantics and another Sort representing the Limit or TOPN semantics.

    • SORT_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS

      public static final SortRemoveConstantKeysRule SORT_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS
      Rule that removes keys from a Sort if those keys are known to be constant, or removes the entire Sort if all keys are constant.

    • SORT_REMOVE_REDUNDANT

      public static final SortRemoveRedundantRule SORT_REMOVE_REDUNDANT
      Rule that removes redundant Order By or Limit when its input RelNode's max row count is less than or equal to specified row count.All of them are represented by Sort

      public static final SortJoinTransposeRule SORT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE

    • UNION_TO_DISTINCT

      public static final UnionToDistinctRule UNION_TO_DISTINCT

    • UNION_TO_VALUES

      public static final UnionToValuesRule UNION_TO_VALUES

    • SAMPLE_TO_FILTER

      public static final SampleToFilterRule SAMPLE_TO_FILTER

    • AGGREGATE_VALUES

    • FILTER_VALUES_MERGE

      public static final ValuesReduceRule FILTER_VALUES_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Filter onto an underlying LogicalValues, resulting in a Values with potentially fewer rows.

    • PROJECT_VALUES_MERGE

      public static final ValuesReduceRule PROJECT_VALUES_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Project onto an underlying LogicalValues, resulting in a Values with different columns.

    • PROJECT_FILTER_VALUES_MERGE

      public static final ValuesReduceRule PROJECT_FILTER_VALUES_MERGE
      Rule that merges a Project on top of a Filter onto an underlying LogicalValues, resulting in a Values with different columns and potentially fewer rows.

    • WINDOW_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS

      public static final ReduceExpressionsRule.WindowReduceExpressionsRule WINDOW_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
      Rule that reduces constants inside a LogicalWindow.
      See Also:
      • FILTER_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS

    • JOIN_TO_HYPER_GRAPH

      public static final JoinToHyperGraphRule JOIN_TO_HYPER_GRAPH
      Rule that flattens a tree of LogicalJoins into a single HyperGraph with N inputs.

    • HYPER_GRAPH_OPTIMIZE

      public static final DphypJoinReorderRule HYPER_GRAPH_OPTIMIZE
      Rule that re-orders a Join tree using dphyp algorithm.
      See Also:
      • JOIN_TO_HYPER_GRAPH

    • EXPAND_FILTER_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL

      public static final ExpandDisjunctionForTableRule EXPAND_FILTER_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL
      Rule that expands disjunction in the condition of a Filter.
      See Also:
      • EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL

    • EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL

      public static final ExpandDisjunctionForTableRule EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL
      Rule that expands disjunction in the condition of a Join.
      See Also:
      • EXPAND_FILTER_DISJUNCTION_GLOBAL

    • EXPAND_FILTER_DISJUNCTION_LOCAL

      public static final ExpandDisjunctionForJoinInputsRule EXPAND_FILTER_DISJUNCTION_LOCAL
      Rule that expands disjunction in the condition of a Filter for join inputs.
      See Also:
      • EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_LOCAL

    • EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_LOCAL

      public static final ExpandDisjunctionForJoinInputsRule EXPAND_JOIN_DISJUNCTION_LOCAL

      See Also:
